price: Tú no esperabas que fuera a serte revelado un Libro, pero por misericordia de tu Señor [te reveló el Corán]. No apoyes [contra los creyentes] a aquellos que se niegan a creer.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta tarjū an yul'qā ilayka al-kitābu illā raḥmatan min rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīran lil'kāfirīna
